name: Shining Force III: Premium Disc
overview: Shining Force III: Premium Disc is a Fan Disc for the Shining Force III series. This game was given when you applied to buy Scenario1, Scenario2, and Scenario3. If you're unfamiliar with Shining Force III, or just not a fan, the Premium Disc will have little significance to you. If you are a fan, however, the Shining Force III Premium Disc is likely the greatest and most interesting bonus disc released for a game to date.
